pokedexEntries.diamond: A Pokémon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to Vespiquen.
pokedexEntries.pearl: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
pokedexEntries.platinum: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
pokedexEntries.heartGold: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a thousand, packed closely together in a lump.
pokedexEntries.soulSilver: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a thousand, packed closely together in a lump.
pokedexEntries.black: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
pokedexEntries.white: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
pokedexEntries.black2: This Pokémon is a set of three. When they sleep, they gather up and form a giant hive of 100 Combee.
pokedexEntries.white2: This Pokémon is a set of three. When they sleep, they gather up and form a giant hive of 100 Combee.
pokedexEntries.x: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
pokedexEntries.y: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
pokedexEntries.omegaRuby: The trio is together from birth. It constantly gathers honey from flowers to please Vespiquen.
pokedexEntries.alphaSapphire: It collects and delivers honey to its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep.
